articles.title: Live Parasitic Worm Found In Australian Woman's Brain In World-First Discovery - NDTV
articles.description: The Ophidascaris robertsi roundworm was pulled from the 64-year-old woman after brain surgery, still alive and wriggling.
articles.content:
The live roundworm after it has been removed from the patient's brain.
In the first case of its kind, Australian doctors discovered a live parasitic roundworm measuring 8 centimetres within the brai… [+1878 chars]
